function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Lack of integrated thermal space conditioning and ventilation provisions","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate triaging and examination procedures for patients with infectious disease symptoms","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate air purification and ventilation may lead to the transmission of airborne infectious diseases within buildings.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Larger droplets gravitationally pulled to surfaces within 1-2m","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Influence of airflow patterns on the spread of infectious aerosols","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate cleaning processes and supplies","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of coordination between engineering disciplines","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate design approaches for infection prevention","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Architects and engineers lacking training in public health may lead to designs with inadequate sunlight access impacting indoor viral communities.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate utilization of natural ventilation and filtration systems may result in an unhealthy indoor environment.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited incorporation of sunlight into lighting designs in healthcare settings may lead to increased reliance on artificial lighting and inadequate infection control.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Incomplete literature review may lead to oversight of important factors in building design for disease mitigation","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of data on different types of buildings and ventilation systems may result in incomplete understanding of their impact on disease transmission","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Relying on simulation models without comprehensive data may lead to inaccurate or unreliable design principles for disease mitigation","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Insufficient understanding of the impact of ventilation and air conditioning systems on disease transmission may result in ineffective building design","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate focus on efficient and sustainable health engineering design systems may lead to the implementation of suboptimal building design strategies","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Delays in project execution due to limitations on the number of workers allowed on construction sites","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Disruption of the economic recovery of nations due to impacts on construction industry","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spread of covid-19 among construction stakeholders","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spread of covid-19 in the built environment","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited productivity on construction operations","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Shortage of skilled workers and materials","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Complying with social distancing mandates on construction sites","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Exposure to covid-19 among construction workers","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact on contractual issues and project management","category":"Legal risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Material shortage and lack of supplies for construction projects","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Workforce reduction due to pandemic","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Workforce reduction in public agencies impacting permit oversight for construction projects","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"In-person interviews conducted at construction sites may expose researchers and interviewees to contagious diseases.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited understanding of the impacts of covid-19 on the construction sector due to the novel and unexpected nature of the pandemic.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Qualitative research methods used to study the impacts of covid-19 on construction projects","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Emergent coding used to identify themes and ideas within the data transcribed from interviews","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Categories of impacts not pre-defined by the research team","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact of employment suspension and unemployment due to covid-19 on construction projects.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Employment suspension and unemployment","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Quarantine and restrictions","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Technical performance of workers","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Distribution and stock of materials","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Public management","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Difficulties of workers to mobilize to work","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Project stops and delays","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unclear communication of data analysis results","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unrecognized relationships between categorical variables","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inferential misuse of descriptive data analysis methods","category":"Legal risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases due to close proximity of profiles on the correspondence plot.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inaccurate measurement of relationship between variables due to observed distance not providing exact measure.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High inertia indicating greater distance between profiles, potentially leading to ineffective planning of infrastructures for disease prevention.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential transmission of contagious diseases in the built environment due to close proximity and association among stakeholders.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate implementation of safety and health protocols in the construction industry","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Job loss among construction workers during the pandemic","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"}]}
